description:
Recca declares that he`s Yanagi`s personal ninja in front of the entire school, which causes all kinds of rumors. Fuko, Recca`s rival, decides to see whether there`s any truth to the claims.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honoo to Fuujin Kiken na Yuuwaku!!
Wind and Fire: A Dangerous Seduction!!
炎と風神 危険な誘惑!!
